title: Introduction to College Algebra with Python

question.text: When adding text in Google Colab, what symbol would you use to create a heading that will appear in the table of contents?

assignments: Create an algebra Colab notebook on your google drive so you can follow along with the videos.
description:
This first video includes an introduction to the course, how it will work, and how to use Google Colaboratory. Follow along to create your first Colab notebook.

Videos throughout these courses will reference problems from these two textbooks:

- Business Math, a Step-by-Step Handbook (2021) by Jean-Paul Oliver

- Algebra and Trigonometry by Jay Abramson
